title: NDTV News-World-news
description: NDTV.com provides the latest information from and in-depth coverage of India and the world. Find breaking news, India news, top stories, elections, politics, business, cricket, movies, lifestyle, health, live TV, videos, photos and more.

entries.title: Warming Climate Affecting Snowfall, Raising Risk Of Summer Droughts: Study
entries.description: The team, led by researchers from the University of Bristol, UK, found that as the planet warms, snowy regions in the Rocky Mountains of North America, the Alps in Europe, along with those in northern Europe, are thawing prematurely.

entries.title: King Charles Currency Enter Circulation For First Time Since Coronation
entries.description: British banknotes bearing the image of King Charles III entered circulation for the first time on Wednesday, nearly two years after he succeeded his mother Queen Elizabeth II.

entries.title: McDonald's Loses Chicken "Big Mac" Trademark Battle Against Irish Food Chain
entries.description: McDonald's has lost a legal battle against an Irish fast food chain after a top EU court ruled Wednesday that the global chain could not exclusively call its chicken burgers "Big Mac".

entries.title: Award Winning Masked Rapper C Gambino Killed In Gang Shooting In Sweden
entries.description: A Swedish rapper who last month was named the country's hip hop artist of the year has been killed in a gang shooting in Gothenburg, Swedish police said on Wednesday.

entries.title: Germany To Buy 20 More Eurofighter Jets To Boost Defence
entries.description: Germany will buy another 20 Eurofighter jets from Airbus, Chancellor Olaf Scholz said on Wednesday, as Berlin battles to bulk up its defences.

entries.title: Will Boeing Starliner Take Sunita Williams To Space On 3rd Attempt Today?
entries.description: Will Indian-origin NASA astronaut Sunita Williams be finally able to fly into space this evening?

entries.title: Watch: China's Highest Waterfall Gets Little Help From A Pipe
entries.description: Scenic park operators in China's Henan province were forced to acknowledge that the country's highest waterfall got a helping hand from a pipe due to a lack of rainfall.

entries.title: Pics: Volcano Erupts In Philippines, Debris Sweeps Through Village
entries.description: Heavy rain washed volcanic mud and debris through a village in the central Philippines on Wednesday, two days after a nearby volcano erupted.

entries.title: China Rebukes US After Blinken Calls Tiananmen Square Incident A "Massacre"
entries.description: China lashed out at the United States on Wednesday after Washington's top diplomat Antony Blinken vowed never to forget the crackdown in Tiananmen Square 35 years ago.

entries.title: Australia's Fearsome "Modern-Day" Dinosaur Bird Stares Down Extinction
entries.description: With legs like a velociraptor and a striking neon blue neck, the southern cassowary cuts a fearsome figure in the rainforests of northeast Australia.

entries.title: Amanda Knox Back In Court For Slander Retrial Linked To Roommate's Murder
entries.description: Amanda Knox returned to court in Italy Wednesday for a slander case related to her infamous jailing, and later acquittal, for the murder of her British roommate in 2007.

entries.title: Drought In Zimbabwe Leaves Children "Crying From Hunger"
entries.description: Mother of four Laiwa Musenza is already reliant on aid from a local NGO to feed her family and Zimbabwe's drought is only getting deeper.

entries.title: Syrian Man Arrested After Shooting Near US Embassy In Lebanon Capital
entries.description: A Syrian man was arrested after a shooting Wednesday near the US embassy in Beirut, the Lebanese army said, with the diplomatic mission saying its personnel were safe.

entries.title: Explained: Why Immigration Is The Key Issue Ahead Of Britain's Elections
entries.description: British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak is promising to cut immigration levels if his Conservative Party wins next month's election, making the issue one of the major battlegrounds of the upcoming vote.

entries.title: Spanish Comedian Punched By Man For "Offensive" Joke About His Son
entries.description: Spanish outlets said that the origin of the comment seems to originate from political differences between the two.

entries.title: Donald Trump Clinches Republican Nomination Despite Hush Money Conviction
entries.description: Donald Trump faced Republican voters for the first time as a convicted felon on Tuesday during the final state primaries for the 2024 presidential nomination, where he continued to sweep up votes.

entries.title: Russia Activist Loses Appeal Against 5-Year Jail For "Justifying Terrorism"
entries.description: Russia's Supreme Court on Wednesday rejected an appeal by sociologist and activist Boris Kagarlitsky against his five-year prison sentence on charges of "justifying terrorism", the TASS state news agency reported.

entries.title: Hamas Hits At Reconciliation Talks With Palestinian Rival Fatah
entries.description: Deep divisions will limit progress at reconciliation talks between Palestinian factions Hamas and Fatah this month, but the meetings highlight that the Islamist group is likely to retain influence after Israel's war in Gaza.

entries.title: China Congratulates PM Modi For Poll Win, Says "Ready To Work"
entries.description: China on Wednesday congratulated Prime Minister Narendra Modi following his election win, adding it was "ready to work" with its neighbour.

entries.title: Village Massacred By Nazis To Be Preserved As Reminder Of War Atrocities
entries.description: A French village preserved as a reminder of Nazi cruelty since Waffen-SS troops murdered 643 people there in 1944 is in danger of decay, sparking efforts to preserve the site.
